newsitem.title: ANGOLA: Port conditions update - Angola - Lloyds Shipping.
newsitem.headline: Port conditions update - Angola - Lloyds Shipping.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --

CABINDA, Sept 11 - Berth 2 at Malongo Terminal will be closed from Oct 20 through Nov 15 for purpose of replacing the two subsea hose strings. Nominations for liftings scheduled for date ranges up to and through Oct 19 will be accepted for berth 2. Starting with liftings scheduled on or after Oct 20, no nominations can be accepted for loading at berth 2. All oil nominations must be for berth 1 during the period Oct 20 through Nov 15. Berth 2 is scheduled to reopen on Nov 16. Nominations for liftings on or after Nov 16 can again be made for berth 2.
